title: Regal Tanzanite and Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: this haaram features meticulously set diamonds with a total weight of 10.50 carats
cushion-cut Tanzanite gemstones totaling 42.82 carats. The diamonds exhibit exceptional brilliance and clarity.
features: This contemporary take on the traditional Haaram features a cascading design with multiple tiers of dazzling diamonds. Two large, captivating Tanzanite stones serve as the focal points, creating a mesmerizing contrast of color and sparkle. The intricate diamond setting enhances the overall brilliance and creates a luxurious, statement piece.
colors: The necklace showcases a striking color palette of icy white from the diamonds and deep blue-purple hues from the Tanzanite gemstones. This sophisticated combination exudes elegance and sophistication.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings
and high-profile events. This Haaram is also a stunning choice for milestone celebrations and special anniversaries. Make a bold statement and radiate regal charm at any formal gathering.
description: This Tanzanite and Diamond Haaram is a true investment piece, combining timeless elegance with modern design. The exceptional quality of the diamonds and the rarity of the Tanzanite gemstones make this necklace a unique and valuable addition to any jewelry collection. Its versatility allows it to be worn with both traditional and contemporary attire.
